name: XO Mania - Noughts and Crosses Puzzle Game
name_original: XO Mania - Noughts and Crosses Puzzle Game
description:
• XO Mania •

Tic-tac-toe (also known as Noughts and crosses or Xs and Os) is a game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- One touch controls
- Lots of fun
- Nice graphics
- Addicting gameplay
- Clear and simple UI

Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master !
